verses.verse: Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> a <S%H6378>vial<s%> of <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and <S%H3332>poured<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> and <S%H5401>kissed<s%> him, and <S%H559>said,<s%> Is it <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H4886>anointed<s%> thee to be <S%H5057>captain<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H5159>inheritance?<s%>

When thou art <S%H1980>departed<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> me <S%H3117>today,<s%> then thou shalt <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> <S%H5973>by<s%> <S%H7354>Rachel's<s%> <S%H6900>sepulcher<s%> in the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> at <S%H6766>Zelzah;<s%> and they will <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, The <S%H860>asses<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H1980>wentest<s%> to <S%H1245>seek<s%> are <S%H4672>found:<s%> and, <S%H2009>lo,<s%> thy <S%H1>father<s%> hath <S%H5203>left<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1697>care<s%> of the <S%H860>asses,<s%> and <S%H1672>sorroweth<s%> for you, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> shall I <S%H6213>do<s%> for my <S%H1121>son?<s%>

Then shalt thou go <S%H2498>on<s%> <S%H1973>forward<s%> from <S%H4480>thence,<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H436>plain<s%> of <S%H8396>Tabor,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> shall <S%H4672>meet<s%> thee <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> going <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H1008>Bethel,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H1423>kids,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3603>loaves<s%> of <S%H3899>bread,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H5375>carrying<s%> a <S%H5035>bottle<s%> of wine: <S%H3196><s%>

And they will <S%H7592>salute<s%> <S%H7965><s%> thee, and <S%H5414>give<s%> thee <S%H8147>two<s%> loaves of <S%H3899>bread;<s%> which thou shalt <S%H3947>receive<s%> of their <S%H4480>hands.<s%> <S%H3027><s%>

After <S%H310>that<s%> <S%H3651><s%> thou shalt <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H1389>hill<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> <S%H8033><s%> is the <S%H5333>garrison<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines:<s%> and it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when thou art <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> to the <S%H5892>city,<s%> that thou shalt <S%H6293>meet<s%> a <S%H2256>company<s%> of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> coming <S%H3381>down<s%> from the high <S%H4480>place<s%> <S%H1116><s%> with a <S%H5035>psaltery,<s%> and a <S%H8596>tabret,<s%> and a <S%H2485>pipe,<s%> and a <S%H3658>harp,<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> them; and <S%H1992>they<s%> shall prophesy: <S%H5012><s%>

And the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H6743>come<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thee, and thou shalt <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> with <S%H5973>them,<s%> and shalt be <S%H2015>turned<s%> into <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%>

And let it <S%H1961>be,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> unto thee, that thou <S%H6213>do<s%> as occasion <S%H834>serve<s%> <S%H4672><s%> <S%H3027><s%> thee; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5973>with<s%> thee.

And thou shalt go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> me to <S%H1537>Gilgal;<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> will come <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> thee, to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and to <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> of peace <S%H8002>offerings:<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shalt thou <S%H3176>tarry,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> I <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> thee, and <S%H3045>show<s%> <S%H853>thee<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> thou shalt <S%H6213>do.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>was<s%> so, that when he had <S%H6437>turned<s%> his <S%H7926>back<s%> to <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H8050>Samuel,<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2015>gave<s%> him <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H3820>heart:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H226>signs<s%> came to <S%H935>pass<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And when they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8033>thither<s%> to the <S%H1389>hill,<s%> <S%H2009>behold,<s%> a <S%H2256>company<s%> of <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H7125>met<s%> him; and the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H6743>came<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> him, and he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them.

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3045>knew<s%> him <S%H4480>formerly<s%> <S%H865><s%> <S%H8032><s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> he <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H5973>among<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets,<s%> then the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H7453>another,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is <S%H2088>this<s%> that is <S%H1961>come<s%> unto the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish?<s%> Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> among the <S%H5030>prophets?<s%>

And <S%H376>one<s%> of the same <S%H4480>place<s%> <S%H8033><s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> But <S%H4310>who<s%> is their <S%H1>father?<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> it <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb,<s%> Is <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> among the <S%H5030>prophets?<s%>
And when he had made an <S%H3615>end<s%> of <S%H4480>prophesying,<s%> <S%H5012><s%> he <S%H935>came<s%> to the high <S%H1116>place.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him and <S%H413>to<s%> his <S%H5288>servant,<s%> <S%H575>Whither<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> ye? And he <S%H559>said,<s%> To <S%H1245>seek<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H860>asses:<s%> and when we <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> they were no <S%H369>where,<s%> we <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel.<s%>
And <S%H7586>Saul's<s%> <S%H1730>uncle<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto you.

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1730>uncle,<s%> He told us <S%H5046>plainly<s%> <S%H5046><s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> the <S%H860>asses<s%> were <S%H4672>found.<s%> But of the <S%H1697>matter<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom,<s%> <S%H834>whereof<s%> <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>spoke,<s%> he <S%H5046>told<s%> him <S%H3808>not.<s%>
And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> called the people <S%H6817>together<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H5971><s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H4709>Mizpeh;<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> out of <S%H4480>Egypt,<s%> <S%H4714><s%> and <S%H5337>delivered<s%> you out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of the <S%H4714>Egyptians,<s%> and out of the <S%H4480>hand<s%> <S%H3027><s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms,<s%> and of them that <S%H3905>oppressed<s%> you:

And <S%H859>ye<s%> have this <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H3988>rejected<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1931>himself<s%> <S%H3467>saved<s%> you out of <S%H4480>all<s%> <S%H3605><s%> your <S%H7451>adversities<s%> and your <S%H6869>tribulations;<s%> and ye have <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Nay, <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> a <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> us. <S%H6258>Now<s%> therefore present <S%H3320>yourselves<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> by your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> and by your <S%H505>thousands.<s%>

And when <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> had <S%H853>caused<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> to come <S%H7126>near,<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> was <S%H3920>taken.<s%>

When he had <S%H853>caused<s%> the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> to come <S%H7126>near<s%> by their <S%H4940>families,<s%> the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H4309>Matri<s%> was <S%H3920>taken,<s%> and <S%H7586>Saul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> was <S%H3920>taken:<s%> and when they <S%H1245>sought<s%> him, he could <S%H3808>not<s%> be <S%H4672>found.<s%>

Therefore they <S%H7592>inquired<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5750>further,<s%> if the <S%H376>man<s%> should <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H1988>thither.<s%> And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>answered,<s%> <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> hath hid <S%H2244>himself<s%> <S%H413>among<s%> the <S%H3627>stuff.<s%>

And they <S%H7323>ran<s%> and <S%H3947>fetched<s%> him <S%H4480>thence:<s%> <S%H8033><s%> and when he <S%H3320>stood<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> he was <S%H1361>higher<s%> than <S%H4480>any<s%> <S%H3605><s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> from his <S%H4480>shoulders<s%> <S%H7926><s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>

And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H7200>See<s%> ye him <S%H834>whom<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H977>chosen,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> there is <S%H369>none<s%> like <S%H3644>him<s%> among <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people?<s%> And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7321>shouted,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> God <S%H2421>save<s%> the <S%H4428>king.<s%>

Then <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H1696>told<s%> <S%H413><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H4941>manner<s%> of the <S%H4410>kingdom,<s%> and <S%H3789>wrote<s%> it in a <S%H5612>book,<s%> and laid it <S%H5117>up<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%> And <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> away, every <S%H376>man<s%> to his <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And <S%H7586>Saul<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H1004>home<s%> to <S%H1390>Gibeah;<s%> and there <S%H1980>went<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> him a band of <S%H2428>men,<s%> <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H3820>hearts<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> had <S%H5060>touched.<s%>

But the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1100>Belial<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4100>How<s%> shall <S%H2088>this<s%> man <S%H3467>save<s%> us? And they <S%H959>despised<s%> him, and <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4503>presents.<s%> But he held his <S%H2790>peace.<s%>
